subject: Re: help
msgSnippet: ... The flip side of that is that if your are practicing TDD it s never an issue... if there is code, it s only there because there was a test that required
messageBody:
> To answer the question "Must I test X?" there are two answers:
>
> 1. Test everything that could possibly not work.
> 2. Test everything that you fear does not work.

The flip side of that is that if your are practicing TDD it's never an
issue... if there is code, it's only there because there was a test
that required it.. so there's never any question... you nevere have to
ask "Must I text X"... but you ask "How do I test X".. where X is some
behaviour.. not some method... so things like setters are not
(typically) behaviour.. they're implementation details.

Dave
